_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: LeaderOS
author: contact@leaderos.net
description: Host LeaderOS software on Pterodactyl Panel.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

cd /mnt/server

apk --update add git

git clone https://github.com/leaderos-net/leaderos-pterodactyl-egg ./temp

cp -r ./temp/nginx /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/php /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/webroot /mnt/server/
cp ./temp/start.sh /mnt/server/
chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh
rm -rf ./temp

if [ "${WORDPRESS}" == "true" ] || [ "${WORDPRESS}" == "1" ]; then
    echo -e "Installing wordpress"
    cd /mnt/server/webroot
    wget http://wordpress.org/latest.tar.gz
    tar xzf latest.tar.gz
   mv wordpress/* .
   rm -rf wordpress latest.tar.gz
   echo -e "Install complete go to http://ip:port/wp-admin "
   exit 0
fi
